name: Toyrnament (Alhkam)
description:
Toyrnament is a side-view arena-based multiplayer for two players. The objective is being the last player alive in each round.

CONTROLSPlayer 1:
  • Movement ---------> A and D
  • Jump ----------------> W
  • Shoot ---------------> SPACE
Player 2:
  • Movement ---------> LEFT and RIGHT
  • Jump ----------------> UP
  • Shoot ---------------> INTRO
